pullrequest.title: Disable loading nested models in DART and Simbody

content.html:
I'm testing the following:

diff -r b85253dfc0ca test/integration/world_reset.cc
--- a/test/integration/world_reset.cc   Fri Jan 15 09:35:12 2016 -0800
+++ b/test/integration/world_reset.cc   Fri Jan 15 10:43:49 2016 -0800
@@ -74,6 +74,13 @@
           << "Please see issue #911.\n";
     return;
   }
+  if (_physicsEngine == "dart" &&
+      _world.find("nested_model") != std::string::npos)
+  {
+    gzerr << "dart fails this test with nested models due to issue #1833"
+          << std::endl;
+    return;
+  }

   Load(_world, true, _physicsEngine);
   physics::WorldPtr world = physics::get_world("default");
